tool_description: Continuously monitors survey response rates against target goals, providing alerts and recommendations when rates fall below thresholds.

survey_id.description: Unique identifier for the survey to monitor

target_response_rate.description: Target response rate as a percentage (1-100)

monitoring_duration_hours.description: How long to monitor in hours

alert_threshold.description: Response rate threshold for alerts as percentage

check_interval_minutes.description: How often to check response rates in minutes

error_messages: Invalid survey_id: Survey ID must be a non-empty string.
Invalid target_response_rate: Must be between 1 and 100.
Invalid monitoring_duration_hours: Must be between 1 and 720 hours.
Invalid alert_threshold: Must be between 1 and 100.
Invalid check_interval_minutes: Must be between 15 and 1440 minutes.
Survey not found: The specified survey ID does not exist.
usage: Provide survey_id and target_response_rate. Configure monitoring_duration_hours, alert_threshold, and check_interval_minutes as needed. Returns monitoring status and recommendations.

current_response_rate.description: Current response rate as a percentage

target_met.description: Whether target response rate has been met

projected_final_rate.description: Projected final response rate based on current trends
